import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import style from "./Login.module.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Login = () => { const [loginMode, setLoginMode] = useState(true); const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); useEffect(()=>{ setLoginMode(true) },[]) const changeLoginForm = () => { setLoginMode(!loginMode); } return (

{loginMode?'Login':'Register'}

{loginMode?(Forgot Password?):''}

{loginMode?"Don't have an account?":"You already have an account?"}

) }
